I think too many all thinking too short term. Short term trading really need a lot of skill and experience. But the risk is always there.Good market easy to play  recent market is not here not there. Down up down up etc.That‚Äôs why good to find those long term keep and then wait for the day they come.Called Hanwell $0.19 now doubledGKE $0.062Secura $0.053Thomson $0.051If just hold on enough already . But didn‚Äôt ride the full wave as eager to take profit.Hence   I think mindset is most important.If want to hold long term then forget about the counter and set trailing SLIf short term then play the momentum and buy on T+4  only top 30 counters etc. Then won‚Äôt Kenna stuckist.So much to learn still.
Learning and discipline is key.Hopefully all can benefit and learn from this group and some of the better players here
